channel.title: Tutorial on A Hugo theme inspired by paged.js
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorial on A Hugo theme inspired by paged.js

item.title: Customization
item.description: The more you know, the less real work you will get done. You have been warned. Site config In your site config file (hugo.yaml or config.yaml), you can customize some options such as the top menu or footer, which should be straightforward to understand if you take a look at the exampleSite’s config file. If you want to add a logo to the left of the top navigation bar, you can use the logo parameter, e.
